summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4617 for the improvement of Brooklyn Avenue from East 75th Street to East 77th Street, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53703, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
